pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves such as Barrier Laminate, Butyl Rubber, Nitrile Rubber, Viton, Barrier Laminate; Shoes plus socks; Protective eyewear (goggles, face shield, or safety glasses)

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes Substantial But Temporary Eye Injury • Harmful if Absorbed Through Skin • Harmful if Swallowed • Prolonged or Frequently Repeated Skin Contact May Cause Allergic Reactions in Some Individuals
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to a unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
